Producer: Chris Evans, Mark Kassen, McG, Mary Viola, Karen Elise Baldwin, Howard Baldwin, William J. Immerman
Screenwriter: Ronald Bass, Jen Smolka, Chris Shafer, Paul Vicknair
Synopsis: A chance encounter between two strangers (Chris Evans, Alice Eve) in Grand Central Terminal sparks a life-changing, nighttime sojourn through New York City.
Title: Before We Go
